name: Collapse (itch) (HalfZee)
description:
O'Toole searches for wealth deep within the mountain. Dig a path to treasure without getting yourself stuck in the hole you just dug. 

Controls: 

A & D = movement

Space = jump

Left mouse = dig

Made in one week for Brackey's Game Jam 9: "An end is a new beginning." Everything was made by me, with only two music tracks composed beforehand.
